mapper.insert: insert into QCQFJCXXB (JCDBH, GQPBH, JCRQ, GQPMC, JCYQ, JCR, LFBH, WZ, C, K, XC, DSSZ, BZ) values (#{jcdbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gqpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jcrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gqpmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jcyq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jcr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lfbh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{wz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{c,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{k,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{xc,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dssz,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update QCQFJCXXB set GQPMC = #{gqpmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JCYQ = #{jcyq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JCR = #{jcr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LFBH = #{lfbh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, WZ = #{wz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C = #{c,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, K = #{k,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, XC = #{xc,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, DSSZ = #{dssz,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where JCDBH = #{jcdbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and GQPBH = #{gqpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and JCRQ = #{jcrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
